name: Monte Carlo Casino Visit
description: Experience the glamour and excitement of the Monte Carlo Casino, a world-famous gambling and entertainment complex.

name: Stroll in the Jardin Exotique
description: Explore the Jardin Exotique, home to a rich collection of exotic plants and offering spectacular views over Monaco.

name: Tour the Prince's Palace
description: Visit the Prince's Palace of Monaco, a historic site and the official residence of the ruling prince, showcasing elegant architecture and history.

name: Oceanographic Museum Visit
description: Discover the Oceanographic Museum of Monaco, an institution dedicated to marine sciences and oceanography, with impressive aquariums and exhibits.

name: Larvotto Beach Relaxation
description: Enjoy a day at Larvotto Beach, Monaco's most popular beach, known for its calm waters and pebbly shores.

name: Monaco Grand Prix Experience
description: Experience the thrill of the Monaco Grand Prix, one of the most prestigious automobile races in the world, held annually on the Circuit de Monaco.

name: Japanese Garden Walk
description: Stroll through the serene Japanese Garden, a peaceful oasis in Monaco, featuring traditional Japanese landscape design.

name: Monte Carlo Harbor Promenade
description: Walk along the Monte Carlo Harbor, admiring luxury yachts and enjoying the vibrant atmosphere of the waterfront.

name: Cathedral of Our Lady Immaculate Visit
description: Visit the Cathedral of Our Lady Immaculate, also known as Monaco Cathedral, a Romanesque-Byzantine church home to the tombs of past sovereigns.

name: Monte Carlo Opera Experience
description: Attend a performance at the Monte Carlo Opera, a cultural institution offering a diverse range of operatic and ballet performances.
